ERROR.GLOBAL: You don't have permission to perform this action!
ERROR.PIN_2: This opinion has already been pinned!
ERROR.REGISTER_2: The password you introduced is too weak! Please introduce a strong password. A strong password has at least 8 characters and contains at least one uppercase letter, one digit and one special character.
ERROR.REGISTER_4: The username you introduced doesn't belong to any public Twitter accout. Make sure that you introduce a valid Twitter username and that the account is not protected.
ERROR.REGISTER_5: An account with this username already exists!
ERROR.UNPIN_2: This opinion has not been pinned!
ERROR.EVALUATE: This opinion has already been evaluated!
ERROR.LOAD: An unexpected error occurred while loading the opinions! Remember that this applications consumes the Twitter Search API, which, unforunately, have rate limits. Please, retry loading the opinions in 15 minutes.
ERROR.EVALUATE_ALL: There are no opinions to evaluate!
ERROR.SERVICE_INDUSTRY_2: The default service industry can't be deleted!
ERROR.SERVICE_INDUSTRY_3: You can't create more than 15 service industries!

SUCCESS.PIN: The opinion has been pinned successfully!
SUCCESS.DELETE_OPINION: The opinion has been deleted successfully!
SUCCESS.EVALUATE: The opinion has been evaluated successfully!
SUCCESS.LOAD_NO_RESULTS: There aren't any new opinions. Please, try again later!
SUCCESS.DELETE_INDUSTRY: The service industry has been deleted successfully!
SUCCESS.CREATE_INDUSTRY: The service industry has been created successfully!
